sentences.en: A clear objective was set and adhered to.
sentences.cn: 定下了明确的目标并坚持到底。

sentences.en: As an impartial observer my analysis is supposed to be objective.
sentences.cn: 作为中立的观察员，我的分析应该客观。

sentences.en: He tried to take an objective view of the situation.
sentences.cn: 他试图对形势有个客观的看法.

sentences.en: He vowed to achieve certain objectives before the end of his presidency.
sentences.cn: 他立誓要在他的总统任期结束之前实现某些目标。

sentences.en: His objective was to kill the space station project altogether.
sentences.cn: 他的目的是使空间站项目全面停止。

sentences.en: His objective was to tire out the climbers.
sentences.cn: 他的目标是使登山者筋疲力尽。

sentences.en: I believe that a journalist should be completely objective.
sentences.cn: 我认为新闻记者不应当有丝毫偏见。

sentences.en: It helps them detach themselves from their problems and become more objective.
sentences.cn: 这有助于他们从所面临的问题中跳出来，变得更客观一些。

sentences.en: Managers should set specific performance objectives for their teams.
sentences.cn: 经理应该为自己的团队制定明确的绩效目标。

sentences.en: Objective Inquiry into the heavy asphyxiation rescues measure of the new born.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的探讨新生儿重度窒息抢救的措施.

sentences.en: One of your first business objectives should be to get your own office.
sentences.cn: 你的首要工作目标之一应该是拥有自己的办公室。

sentences.en: Our main objective was the recovery of the child safe and well.
sentences.cn: 我们的主要目标是将孩子安然无恙地找回来。

sentences.en: Plainly, a more objective method of description must be adopted.
sentences.cn: 显而易见，必须采用更为客观的描述方法。

sentences.en: Postmodernists say there is no objective truth. Why should anyone believe them?
sentences.cn: 后现代主义者声称不存在客观事实。人们凭什么要相信他们呢？

sentences.en: Scientists need to be objective when doing research.
sentences.cn: 科学家做研究时要客观。

sentences.en: the best way to accomplish your objectives
sentences.cn: 完成目标的最佳方法

sentences.en: The cultivation in good taste is our main objective.
sentences.cn: 培养高雅情趣是我们的主要目标.

sentences.en: The degree program has two main objectives.
sentences.cn: 该学位课程有两个主要目标。

sentences.en: The main objective was to improve children’s knowledge of geography.
sentences.cn: 主要目的是要增长儿童的地理知识。

sentences.en: They're asked to make objective, in inverted commas, evaluations of these statements.
sentences.cn: 他们被要求对这些陈述作所谓“客观”的评价。

sentences.en: Try to keep a clear-sighted view of your objective.
sentences.cn: 对目标要有明确的认识。

sentences.en: Under no circumstances should we lose sight of our main objective.
sentences.cn: 在任何情况下,我们都不能忘记自己的宗旨.

sentences.en: We have no real, objective, scientific evidence for our belief.
sentences.cn: 我们并无实际、客观、科学的证据支撑我们的信仰。

words.tran_cn: 使具体化，使客观化；体现
没有偏见的,中立的,不受影响的,公正的
目的,愿望,意思,计划,目标

phrases.tran_cn: 客观知识；客观认识；客观熟悉

trans.tran_cn: 客观的，基于事实的，宾格的
trans.tran_en: based on facts, or making a decision that is based on facts rather than on your feelings or beliefs
something that you are trying hard to achieve, especially in business or politics
